name: rosell-dk/webp-convert
description: Convert JPEG & PNG to WebP with PHP

scripts-descriptions.phpcs: Checks coding styles (PSR2) of file/dir, which you must supply. To check all, supply 'src'
scripts-descriptions.phpcbf: Fix coding styles (PSR2) of file/dir, which you must supply. To fix all, supply 'src'
scripts-descriptions.cs-fix-all: Fix the coding style of all the source files, to comply with the PSR-2 coding standard
scripts-descriptions.cs-fix: Fix the coding style of a PHP file or directory, which you must specify.

suggest.ext-gd: to use GD extension for converting. Note: Gd must be compiled with webp support
suggest.ext-imagick: to use Imagick extension for converting. Note: Gd must be compiled with webp support
suggest.ext-vips: to use Vips extension for converting.
suggest.php-stan/php-stan: Suggested for dev, in order to analyse code before committing
